page.title: 09Events In Norton Area.
page.content: {Village Hall, Norton. } Every school day we have dinner there, and twice a week W.R.V.S. meals are served to old people. Youth Club is held every Tuesday, Keep Fit on Wednesday , Ballroom Dancing on Monday and Doctor's Surgery on Friday. The Over Sixties meet at the Village Hall, as do the Mothers _and _Toddlers , the Church Ladies' Guild and the Parish Council. The Women's Institute meets once a month, there is Bingo on some Thursdays and during elections the hall is used as a Polling Station. There are Christmas Fairs and parties, a Christmas Show, Rummage Sales,Whist Drives and Beetle Drives. Wedding receptions,funeral meals, parties,dinners and meetings are held there.
